structure.unit: LEVY AND ASSESSMENT OF PROPERTY TAXES

law.history: Repealed 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 343, sec. 10, effective July 13, 1990. -- Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 397, sec. 6.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Cumulative increase for 1982-83 only by a city or urban-county government -- Limit -- Public hearing and recall not applicable.
